articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump kicks off White House campaign with events in New Hampshire, South Carolina
articles.description: Numerous Republicans are considering whether to launch their own White House bids, including Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, widely seen as the biggest threat to Trump. Several top Republicans in both states that Trump visited on Saturday - including New Hampshire Governor Chris Sununu and former South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley - are weighing presidential campaigns.
